ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( How_Did_You_Hear_About_SGK_TAP__c , 'Other') , ISBLANK( Other_Sources__c ), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please Specify "How Did You Hear About SGK TAP".
